page.title: 12Village life
page.content:
These are the views of Mrs. Cox expressed during interview with her.
{ Mrs. Cox}has always lived in Batcombe.She has seen many{changes and initially stated that she liked none of them. She said, "give me the good old days." She admitted that she preffered {electricity}to{oil}but she does cook on the{Rayburn}sometimes. She thought the{medical care}was better when she was a child although she almost died of{pneumonia. She thinks it was better when the {general store, laundry}and{butcher were around but she wished the {slaughter house}hadn't been built. She is{superstitious}and thinks the cows from the slaughter house have{ghosts.
